::Spears::

Sher mind went realling. She could see flashes of her and Striker 
walking down the halls of the Ark together. She saw Striker holding 
her close and looking into his eyes. 

Now all she could see was the fact that he was gone. She lifted her 
head and looked at Firearm. "Will you do me a favor...if we can't get 
Striker back.... shoot me...I won't want to live if he's not with me."
She got up and walked towards the door. She was walking in a half 
daze. She really wasn't even thinking about what she was saying. It 
was her broken spark rambling on.  She walked to the door, with tears 
still running down her cheeks.
